name: Turkey Meal Balls with Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt Steggles Italian style turkey meatballs

recipeInstructions.text: Peal your garlic and crush it and peel your onion and dice it.
In a large non stick frying pan put 1 tsp of oil in it and place crushed garlic and diced onion an season with a little salt and cracked pepper. Cook until the onion is translucent.
Now add your steggles Italian style turkey meatballs and brown them and turning the every so often.
Now in a large pot fill 3/4 full of water and season it with some salt and put some oil in it and turn on high until its at a rolling boil.
Now add your Essentials Chunky Pasta Sauce 700g to the meat balls and stir and once starting to bubble turn down to simmer

Once the sauce has been simmering for a while it's now time to put your linguine pasta in and cook it as you prefer it or as packet instructions. Once your pasta is the way you like it drain it and then rinse it (you can just do the past the way you normally do it it).
Once the pasta is cooked its time to plate up.
You can serve it with some nice homemade garlic bread.
